channel.title: Tor's Control Port could not be reach. (Code: 255)
channel.description:
Hi,
After the dist-upgrade on the gateway, it became unable to connect to tor. The whonix check gave this: [code] Tor Bootstrap Result: Tor's Control Port could not be reach. (Code: 255) (tor_bootstrap_status: ERROR: Variable tor_bootstrap_status is empty. Please report this Whonix bug!).[/code]
I tried to launch arm with no success.
If I should on [url=https://tor.stackexchange.com/]stack[/url] instead the whonix forums, I apologize for it.

item.title: Tor's Control Port could not be reach. (Code: 255)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You shouldn’t update from 7 to 8 anyway. Updates aren’t signed with a key 7 is aware. And unsigned updates are recommended against anyway:

Whonix – 18 Jun 19

Security Guide - Whonix

THIS WIKI PAGE IS DEPRECATED AND OUTDATED. PLEASE REFER TO THE BASIC SECURITY GUIDE SECTION - https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation

Read full topic
item.source: Tor's Control Port could not be reach. (Code: 255)

item.title: Tor's Control Port could not be reach. (Code: 255)
item.dc:creator: tryoti
item.description:
I was using whonix 7 and it happened during the upgrade for the next version.
Should I uninstall whonix 7 on virtualbox and install whonix 8 instead?

EDIT: I just read your topic on version 8. I have to download manually images.
Thanks for your work.

Read full topic
item.source: Tor's Control Port could not be reach. (Code: 255)

item.title: Tor's Control Port could not be reach. (Code: 255)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
What version are you using? Whonix 7 is no longer supported. Shouldn’t happen with Whonix 8.

Read full topic
